channel.title: Recent spins on WKCR
channel.description: The most recent songs played on WKCR and logged on Spinitron, WKCR's playlist handling service provider.

item.title: Arlene Auger, Julia Hamari, Lutz-Michael Harder, Philippe Huttenlicher, and Helmuth Rilling: 'Cantata BWV 43: "Gott fahret auf mit Jauchzen"'
item.description: 'Cantata BWV 43: "Gott fahret auf mit Jauchzen"' by Arlene Auger, Julia Hamari, Lutz-Michael Harder, Philippe Huttenlicher, and Helmuth Rilling from CD 92.015 (Hanssler Classic, 1999, Classical, CD) spun at 9:35pm EST Sun Dec 30th 2018 by Julian Vleeschhouwer on Bachfest: Ascension Oratorio and Cantatas, WKCR-FM NY, WKCR HD 1

item.title: Ann Monoyios, Daniel Taylor, Frederick Urrey, Christopheren Nomura, and Greg Funfgeld: 'Ascension Oratorio, BWV 11'
item.description: 'Ascension Oratorio, BWV 11' by Ann Monoyios, Daniel Taylor, Frederick Urrey, Christopheren Nomura, and Greg Funfgeld from DOR-90306 (Dorian Recordings, 2002, Classical, CD) spun at 9:04pm EST Sun Dec 30th 2018 by Julian Vleeschhouwer on Bachfest: Ascension Oratorio and Cantatas, WKCR-FM NY, WKCR HD 1

item.title: Aldo Parisot: 'Suite No. 5 for Solo Cello: Prelude and Allemande'
item.description: 'Suite No. 5 for Solo Cello: Prelude and Allemande' by Aldo Parisot from Suite No. 5 for Solo Cello: Prelude and Allemande (Counterpoint, 1959, Single) spun at 5:58pm EST Sun Dec 30th 2018 by Simon C on BachFest 12/30/18, WKCR-FM NY, WKCR HD 1 -- rereleased digitally 2014 EMG classical
